solution_line_template: Faith must pay ${cake_stand_cost} + ${flour_cost} = $<<{cake_stand_cost}+{flour_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for the flour and cake stand.
Her two $20 bills amount to ${bill_value} x {num_bills} = $<<{bill_value}*{num_bills}={bills_total}>>{bills_total}.
So, she gave the cashier a total of ${bills_total} + ${loose_coins} = $<<{bills_total}+{loose_coins}={total_given}>>{total_given}.
